Reviews.Title: Great Experience
Reviews.Author: Oge
Reviews.Content: I have used this phone for a month. it's a great phone. The camera gives clear picture. So far, everything works just fine. The applications are simply amazing...I don't have to wait to get on my computer all the time, and oh, i love the fact that I skype with it. Highly recommended!!! I couldn't find any reviews when i was making my purchase. I hope this helps someone.Ok, so I've used this phone for 4months and this an update. It still works as I stated earlier, but it suddenly turns itself off and on. At first, I didnt bother because those didnt happen often but after a while it got annoying(note that this doesn't happen very often...say twice in a month.Sometimes, the network suddenly disappears and I have to pull out the battery and stick it back for the network to start working again, but I think this may be a network issue rather than a phone-related problem. Hey, if you're looking for a phone that does skype video call, this is not the phone. It does wonderful skype call but does not enable video calls. I dont expect any other thing to go wrong, and I'm retaining my rating because the phone is great. By the way, I will copy and paste this review in another link for this phone just so I'd stop getting prompts for a review. Apparently, I reviewed a different display of the phone and not my amazon-verified purchase

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented!
Reviews.Author: DAVID T ROUSTIO
Reviews.Content: I purchased a a Samsung GT-S5360L on June 17, 2013. I specifically chose your post because it said "US-Warranty." Now the phone doesn't work and I just got off the phone with Samsung. It doesn't have a US Warranty it's sold in Pakistan, Netherlands, or Phillipines. I feel you completely misrepresented your product.

Reviews.Title: For Fun Only!
Reviews.Author: Dana
Reviews.Content: LOVE it cuz it's pink, can make and receive calls, and send/receive picturesCONS: it's australian and has too much crap on the home screen I don't want. The wifi connections are kinda s***ty and don't really work.

Reviews.Title: water proof?
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: Good phone for kids, easy to use and very small back pocket size. Dropped it in the doggie water dish and it still works!

Reviews.Title: nice one
Reviews.Author: bianca
Reviews.Content: this phone is pretty cute and a nice color but it's kind a slow after a while.I love the scratchy back :)

Reviews.Title: The Phone was a gift to someone else......
Reviews.Author: Marcus Wilkins
Reviews.Content: It was pretty straight forward in terms of instructions, you turn it on and right away it looks for your sim card, when it doesn't find one it directs you to set up wifi. I found the instructions to be very helpful, as far as i know the person the phone was meant for is enjoying it as well as I have had no complaints! The phone was meant to be sold in Mexico as the instruction manual is in spanish, how ever when you turn phone on, the instructions on phone are in english!

Reviews.Title: I received an incorrect model
Reviews.Author: Williams
Reviews.Content: I requested the GT-S5360L mosdel but sent me wrong model GT-S5360T. Not sure that it works correctly in my region.

Reviews.Title: the color is the only thing i like about the phone
Reviews.Author: josh amburn
Reviews.Content: love the color & that's about it. Won't download apps, half the time picture texts don't send, ect.... If u just want a basic phone this will work for you.

Reviews.Title: note coded for us
Reviews.Author: An0nBU73R
Reviews.Content: This is an australian phone so if you try to add US coded apps they dont work and the phone flips out.  I tried to get the amazon appstore app so i could get a facebook app...didnt work.i spent an hour on it.  Also wouldnt connect to my wifi.  Its a pretty phone if u dont want to do anything with it.

Reviews.Title: Got it for my sister
Reviews.Author: rasulcan
Reviews.Content: very nice, small but yet smart telephone. she loved it. lots of good specifications, worth to its price, recommend it

Reviews.Title: not sure
Reviews.Author: nope
Reviews.Content: i both this phone for my girlfriend.  so for we had it over 2 weeks now.  and it's been a good phone.  but you can't find covers for it anywhere that's why i give it a 3

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2MP Camera with Geo-tagging; 3.0" TFT Capacitive Touchscreen, 256K colors, with TouchWiz UI and Touch sensitive controls; GPS with A-GPS support; Stereo FM radio with RDS; MicroSD Card Slot expendable up to 32GB; MP3 and MP4 Player and Social Networking.
Android OS, v2.3.5 (Gingerbread); CPU 830 MHz ARMv6; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Hotspot functionality; Bluetooth; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; 3.5mm Audio Jack; Accelerometer, proximity and compass Sensors; Java MIDP 2.1 and Quickoffice document viewer.
Talk time Up to 17 h (2G)/Up to 6 h 20 min (3G)- Standby Up to 850 h (2G)/Up to 540 h (3G).
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S5360L Galaxy Y Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Coral Pink
